articles.description: While we'll have to wait to learn more about two of the newest supes to join Season 4 of The Boys, Prime Video has shared the first looks of Susan Heyward's Sister Sage and Valorie Curry's Firecracker.
articles.content: While we'll have to wait to learn more about two of the newest supes to join Season 4 of The Boys, Prime Video has shared the first looks of Susan Heyward's Sister Sage and Valorie Curry's Firecracke… [+1533 chars]
